VSETUP.DESCRIPTION: Set up a voice channel as a temporary channel generator
VSETUP.INFO: Temporary channels will be created when someone joins the voice channel
VSETUP.INVALID_ID: ‚ùå Please provide a valid channel ID
VSETUP.INVALID_CHANNEL: ‚ùå Could not find a channel with that ID
VSETUP.INVALID_VOICE: ‚ùå The channel must be a voice channel
VSETUP.INVALID_LIMIT: ‚ùå The limit must be a number between 0 and 99
VSETUP.NO_NAMES: ‚ùå You must provide at least one name
VSETUP.DUPLICATED: ‚ö†Ô∏è This channel is already configured as a generator

VLISTA.DESCRIPTION: Shows the list of configured temporary channel generators
VLISTA.TITLE: üé§ **Configured Channel Generators:**

VQUITAR.NEXT_USERS: New users joining the channel will not create temporary channels
VQUITAR.INVALID_ID: ‚ùå Please provide a valid channel ID
VQUITAR.NOT_FOUND: ‚ùå There is no generator configured in that channel

VSTATUS.DESCRIPTION: Shows the current status of temporary channels
VSTATUS.TITLE: üìä **Temporary Channels Status:**
VSTATUS.CREATOR: Created by
VSTATUS.EMPTY: üì≠ There are no active temporary channels at this moment

VEDITAR.NO_CHANGES: ‚ö†Ô∏è You must specify at least one change (names or limit)
VEDITAR.NOT_FOUND: ‚ùå There is no generator configured in that channel
